# VirtualScroller.updateScrollerOffset() method

Recalculates the offset between [scroller element](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller.setscroller) and [container element](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller.setcontainer)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
updateScrollerOffset(): void;
```

**Returns**

void

## Remarks

By default debounced at `256` milliseconds and called automatically when:

- [setScroller](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller.setscroller) was called;

- [setContainer](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller.setcontainer) was called;

- [scroller element](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller.setscroller) was resized.

Normally this is enough, needed only if something else would trigger this offset change.
